_legend._description: This section documents the god roll JSON file format. It is ignored during import.
_legend.exportedAt: (optional) ISO 8601 timestamp when the file was created
_legend.godRolls: (required) Array of weapons with saved god roll profiles
_legend.godRolls[].weaponHash: (required) Destiny 2 manifest hash for the weapon (find on light.gg or d2foundry.gg)
_legend.godRolls[].weaponName: (optional) Human-readable weapon name, for your reference only
_legend.godRolls[].profiles: (required) Array of god roll profiles for this weapon
_legend.godRolls[].profiles[].name: (required) Display name for the profile (e.g., 'PvP God Roll')
_legend.godRolls[].profiles[].selection: (required) Object mapping perk hashes to selection type
_legend.godRolls[].profiles[].selection[perkHash: 'AND' = must have (required perk), 'OR' = nice to have (optional perk)
